summary: When giant monsters crawl out of the Atlantic Ocean and attack the Eastern Seaboard the US Government is forced to trust a trio of mischievous soldiers, specialized in piloting gigantic robots, to defend America.
cast: Graham Greene|Anthony 'Treach' Criss|David Chokachi|Jackie Moore|Nicole Alexandra Shipley|Larry Gamell Jr.|Steven Marlow|Jinhi Evans|Sara Bond|Melissa Foster|William Shannon Williams|Marquez Linder|Conner Bryan|Nicole Dickson|Demetrius Stear|Jared Cohn|Kyndalle Sheigh Allen|Jojue Alvarado|Jennifer Alvare|Jessica Batista|Connor Bednar|Cameron 'Teddy' Bell|Trista Bloula|Angela Bonner|Robert Bonner|Shirley E. Bridges|Brenda Brown|Rick Brown|Jaanika Kaarpalu|Cecelia Kuhn|Eric C. Schmitz|Nic Schuck|Savannah Sinor|Megan Rebelo
keywords: psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|eastern seaboard|soldier|u.s. government
title: Atlantic rim
